segments.text: Are there other chores for us to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We also have to vacuum the house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You used to do this by yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll do the second floor and you do the first floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . You're going to do the entire house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to mow the lawn .
segments.speaker: S2
